title: Must Apply with the Amsterdam Housing Authority First - Open Waitlist
posting_body: ['***APPLICANTS MUST APPLY TO THE AMSTERDAM HOUSING AUTHORITY FIRST**', 'Woodrow Wilson Townhomes', '141 Woodrow Road', 'Amsterdam NY, 12010', 'P:', 'show contact info', '***WAITLIST/ INCOME RESTRICTIONS***', 'Our townhomes are affordable and have spacious floorplans from 1-bedroom all the way to 4-bedroom townhomes.', 'Our community has a playground, basketball court, and laundry facility.', 'CALL US TODAY to make it your new home!', 'Woodrow Wilson Townhomes is an income-restricted community.', 'The rental amount is determined based on income.', 'Contact our on-site management team to get more information or set up a visit to your new home!', 'You can apply with the Amsterdam Housing Authority by following the website; <URL>', '***WAITLIST/ INCOME RESTRICTIONS***', '1BR - $RENT BASED ON INCOME*', '2BR - $RENT BASED ON INCOME*', '3BR - $RENT BASED ON INCOME*', '4BR - $RENT BASED ON INCOME*', 'Call Office for Information on Availability*', '_____________________________________________', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES:', 'Air Conditioning', 'Cable/Satellite Ready', 'Wood Flooring', 'Refrigerator', 'Stove', '*SOME UTILITIES INCLUDED* Call the office for more information', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES:', 'Online Payment System', 'Off-Street Parking', 'Laundry Facility', 'Playground', 'Basketball Court', 'On-Site Management Office', 'PET POLICY:', 'No Pets Allowed', 'WHO ELSE CAN OFFER YOU ALL THIS?', 'CALL US AT', 'show contact info', 'OFFICE HOURS:', 'Monday - Friday:', 'By Appointment Only', 'Saturday: Currently Not Available', '***APPLICANTS MUST APPLY TO THE AMSTERDAM HOUSING AUTHORITY FIRST.', 'You can apply with the Amsterdam Housing Authority by following the website; <URL> ***', 'A Vesta Community', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up-to-date information', 'Apartment Apartments 2 Bedroom Apartment 3 Bedroom Apartment 2 bedroom apartment 3 bedroom apartment Three bedroom three bedroom 2&3 bedroom apartment 2&3 Bedroom Apartment 2 bedroom 3 bedroom Two Bedroom two bedroom 2 Bed Room 3 Bed Room 1 bedroom apartments one bedroom apartments 1 Bedroom apartments 1 Bedroom Apartments One Bedroom Apartments One Bedroom apartments One Bedroom Apartments 2 bedroom apartments 2 Bedroom apartments 2 Bedroom Apartments Two Bedroom Apartments Two bedroom apartments two bedroom apartments Two Bedroom apartments Three Bedroom Apartments three bedroom apartments Three Bedroom apartments 3 bedroom apartments 3 Bedroom apartments Three Bedroom Apartment three bedroom apartment', 'Three Bedroom apartment 3 bedroom apartment 3 Bedroom apartment 2&3 Bedroom Apartments']
